subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Belmont, a No. 11 seed that will face Arizona in its N.C.A.A. tournament opener, has evolved into more than just a long-range threat.
snippet: Belmont, a No. 11 seed that will face Arizona in its N.C.A.A. tournament opener, has evolved into more than just a long-range threat.
